scripts.setup-git: git config --global user.email 'ferbroine.234@gmail.com' && git config --global user.name 'thecrusher2345'
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../contacts && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist ../server && cd ../server
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run setup-git && git remote add origin https://github.com/thecrusher2345/AppContacts2.git && git pull origin master && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy' && git checkout master && git merge HEAD && git push HEAD:master
